title: Nigeria Arrests RaccoonO365 Phishing Developer Linked to Microsoft 365 Attacks
description: Authorities in Nigeria have announced the arrest of three "high-profile internet fraud suspects" who are alleged to have been involved in phishing attacks targeting major corporations, including the main developer behind the RaccoonO365 phishing-as-a-service (PhaaS) scheme.
